Dear Harrys
This is a brief report on my trip to California as an
official representative ©f NAEB to the University Film Producers
Association* I shall give a more detailed report on my activities
at the Norman meeting*
When Graydon Ausmus asked me to represent NAEB at this
meeting, X told him that I would be glad to do so, provided my ex^
pauses could be defrayed* Since my expenses to study management
at WQI~TV at Ames, Iowa, for a period of a week were to be do*
frayed by FAE at approximately the same time of the year. It
seemed to me that I should group these two meetings and charge
t© NAEB only my expenses from Ames t© Dos Angeles and return©
I was advanced $25© I*®*1 $**1® purpose by Frank Schooley© The
expenses to Dos Angeles, therefore, are as followsi
Air trip from Arses to Dos Angeles and return $ 215 ol?
5 days at the University of Southern
California % $10 per day _ 50* 00
Total $ 265*17-
As you will note, this amount is slightly above the $250 advance©
I shall be very happy to assume the difference in view of the fact
that I was travelling by car and made this trip to Dos Angeles a
part of my vacation.,
I believe,1 can safely say that my mission was accomplished,
Mr* Herbert Farmer, President of UFPA, appointed a new committee,
called Television Committee, to make recommendations to him© This
Committee consists of:
Mr, Wilbur T* Blums
University of Southern California
